name: nowdatabase
description: NOW - New and Old Worlds - Database of fossil mammals

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run prisma
scripts.install:all: npm i && cd backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i && cd ..
scripts.check: echo "Running checks for both services..." && npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend && echo "All good! :)"
scripts.check:backend: echo "Running backend tsc ..." && cd backend && npx tsc --noEmit && echo "Running backend eslint ..."&& npm run lint
scripts.check:frontend: echo "Running frontend tsc ..." && cd frontend && npx tsc --noEmit && echo "Running frontend eslint ..." && npm run lint
scripts.test:docker:ci: npm run test:docker -- backend db-anon frontend
scripts.test:docker:ci:api: npm run test:docker -- backend db-anon frontend api-tests --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from api-tests
scripts.test:docker:ci:e2e: npm run test:docker -- backend db-anon frontend e2e-tests --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from e2e-tests
scripts.prisma: cd backend && npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema_log.prisma
scripts.reset-anon-db: docker exec -it nowdb-db-anon sh -c "mariadb --user root -padmin now_test < /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/sqlfiles/now_test.sql" && docker exec -it nowdb-db-anon sh -c "mariadb --user root -padmin now_log_test < /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/sqlfiles/now_log_test.sql"
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean
